title: Top-Rated Niseko Ski Suites in the Heart of Hirafu Village with JPY10,000 Drinks & Dining Credit
description:
Slalom through the world’s finest snow with a stylish stay at the ultra-modern Chatrium Niseko Japan - a luxe resort claiming prime ski real estate in the heart of Hirafu Village, just minutes from the powder-white snow. Beautifully cradled by the snowy peaks of Mount Yotei and Mt. Niseko-Annupuri, and housed within Shiki Niseko's iconic architecture, Chatrium Niseko offers a contemporary retreat for those seeking ample space and apartment-style luxuries within easy reach of the Grand Hirafu slopes. Everything you need is at your fingertips at this renowned resort, ranked among the top 10% worldwide and #1 in the area on Tripadvisor.

Averaging 15  to 16 metres of perfect powder each year, Niseko is a ski lover’s dream and a winter wonderland waiting to be discovered. Experience it all from this impressive hotel that flaunts a blizzard of world-class dining facilities, including four impressive restaurants - ranging from Michelin-star French-Japanese cuisine to Western favourites and tapas-style dining - and a 24-hour market, perfect for aprés-ski snacks. Plus, enjoy access to the resort's premier equipment rental service and keep your kit dry in your own personal locker - ready for another day on the mountain.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- JPY10,000 drinks and dining credit per package to spend onsite (see the Fine Print for details)
- Arrive to a complimentary beer and soft drink per person in your minibar
- Stay refreshed with a complimentary bottle of water per person, per day

**Longer stay bonus:** Extend your escape to 10 nights or more and receive JPY20,000 drinks and dining credit per package.

**Travelling with family?** Choose a Two-Bedroom package for up to four guests or a super-spacious Three-Bedroom package with sweeping Mt. Niseko-Annupuri views for up to six guests.

**Book with 100% Confidence:** Right up until 21 days before check-in you can enjoy unlimited, free date changes, or cancel and get a 100% credit to use at Luxury Escapes for any other Limited Time Lux Exclusive accommodation, tour or cruise offer. Excludes flights, see the Fine Print for details.
offer_address: Shiki Niseko 2-3, 1-Jo 3-Chome, Niseko Hirafu, Abuta-Gun, Kutchan-Cho, Hokkaido 0440080, Japan

title: Grand Opening: Niseko Ski Luxury with Daily À La Carte Breakfast, Onsen Access & Travel Until 2023
description:
Encounter a kaleidoscope of winter wonder with an unforgettable stay at the luxuriously appointed, brand-new Intuition Niseko. Hidden within Hokkaido, Japan’s premier ski capital, and opening in December 2021, Intuition Niseko invites you to discover the legendary powder of Niseko, take a breath of fresh mountain air and sit back to watch the mist shroud the magnificent Mount Yōtei from within its six storeys.

Discover the vibrancy of Hirafu Village, experience the region's powder-white slopes from the enviably located ski lift and retreat to your private apartment hideaway, nestled within a tranquil forest, where you can soak in the naturally heated thermal waters of the onsite onsen - a quintessentially Japanese experience. Best of all, you can enjoy travel anytime over the next two snow-filled ski seasons!

- Start your adventure with daily continental breakfast at the onsite restaurant
- Enjoy pure relaxation with complimentary access to the Kagenagashi Onsen
- Celebrate your escape with a daily glass of beer, wine or soft drink per person
- 10% discount on ski lessons, equipment hire and private airport transfers

**Family upgrades available:** One child (under 12) stays free with daily breakfast when you upgrade to the One-Bedroom Premier Apartment or Two-Bedroom Premier Apartment (valid for up to four guests and one child). Children under 7 receive a free ski lift pass.

**Travelling with a larger group?** Choose the Two-Bedroom Deluxe or Two-Bedroom Premier Apartment with inclusions for up to four guests. For groups of up to six, choose the Three-Bedroom Yotei Apartment.
